channel.title: nVIDIA Refreshes GPU Roadmap & Announces Pascal-Based Series
channel.description:
"During a keynote speech at our annual GPU Technology Conference in San Jose, Calif., nVIDIA CEO Jen-Hsun Huang updated our public GPU roadmap with the announcement of Pascal, the GPU family that will follow this year’s Maxwell GPUs."
[url='https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/nvidia_refreshes_gpu_roadmap_and_announces_pascal.html']https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/nvidia_refreshes_gpu_roadmap_and_announces_pascal.html[/url]
